tasks.title: Setup Project Infrastructure
tasks.description: Initialize the project with proper folder structure, dependencies, and development environment setup.

tasks.title: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Create user registration, login, and JWT-based authentication system with secure password hashing.

tasks.title: Design Database Schema
tasks.description: Design and implement MongoDB schemas for users, tasks, task assignments, and keystores.

tasks.title: Create Task Management API
tasks.description: Implement CRUD operations for tasks including creation, reading, updating, and deletion with proper validation.

tasks.title: Add Task Assignment System
tasks.description: Allow users to assign tasks to other team members and track assignment history.

tasks.title: Implement User Management
tasks.description: Create endpoints for user listing, search, and profile management with pagination support.

tasks.title: Add AI Task Suggestions
tasks.description: Integrate OpenAI API to generate task descriptions from brief titles with streaming responses.

tasks.title: Setup API Documentation
tasks.description: Implement Swagger/OpenAPI documentation for all endpoints with proper examples and schemas.

tasks.title: Add Request Logging
tasks.description: Implement structured logging for all API requests including user tracking and performance metrics.

tasks.title: Create Docker Configuration
tasks.description: Setup Docker containers for the application and database with proper networking and environment variables.

tasks.title: Implement Task Filtering
tasks.description: Add advanced filtering options for tasks by status, assignee, date range, and search terms.

tasks.title: Add Task Time Tracking
tasks.description: Allow users to log time spent on tasks and generate time reports for better project management.

tasks.title: Setup Email Notifications
tasks.description: Implement email notifications for task assignments, updates, and due date reminders.

tasks.title: Create Dashboard Analytics
tasks.description: Build analytics dashboard showing task completion rates, user productivity, and project insights.

tasks.title: Implement File Attachments
tasks.description: Allow users to attach files to tasks with proper file validation and storage management.

metadata.description: Comprehensive seed data for SprintSync application
metadata.notes: Includes demo users and tasks with various statuses for testing. Admin user: admin@sprintsync.com, Regular users password: password123
